body:
When a negative index is passed in the following error shows up:

```
panic: runtime error: index out of range [-76]

goroutine 1 [running]:
_/home/mfarina/Code/helm/helm/pkg/strvals.setIndex(...)
	/home/mfarina/Code/helm/helm/pkg/strvals/parser.go:239
_/home/mfarina/Code/helm/helm/pkg/strvals.(*parser).listItem(0xc0001ea220, 0x627e80, 0x0, 0x0, 0xffffffffffffffb4, 0x0, 0xc00000005b, 0x0, 0x0, 0x7f60250e9068)
	/home/mfarina/Code/helm/helm/pkg/strvals/parser.go:267 +0x12d4
_/home/mfarina/Code/helm/helm/pkg/strvals.(*parser).key(0xc0001ea220, 0xc0001ec3f0, 0x4e922d, 0x5109a0)
	/home/mfarina/Code/helm/helm/pkg/strvals/parser.go:177 +0xfc6
_/home/mfarina/Code/helm/helm/pkg/strvals.(*parser).parse(0xc0001ea220, 0xc0001ec3f0, 0x0)
	/home/mfarina/Code/helm/helm/pkg/strvals/parser.go:133 +0x82
_/home/mfarina/Code/helm/helm/pkg/strvals.Parse(0xc00008de78, 0x6, 0x6, 0x6, 0xc00008de78)
	/home/mfarina/Code/helm/helm/pkg/strvals/parser.go:48 +0xfd
_/home/mfarina/Code/helm/helm/pkg/strvals.Fuzz(0x7f6025139000, 0x6, 0x6, 0x3)
	/home/mfarina/Code/helm/helm/pkg/strvals/fuzz.go:17 +0x7d
go-fuzz-dep.Main(0xc00008df70, 0x1, 0x1)
	go-fuzz-dep/main.go:36 +0x1ad
main.main()
	_/home/mfarina/Code/helm/helm/pkg/strvals/go.fuzz.main/main.go:15 +0x52
exit status 2
```

This was found while testing the fuzzing PR at #8124

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: bug

labels.description: Issues and Pull Requests related to the major version v3
labels.name: v3.x

title: strvals parsing fails on negative index
